医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
全球研究重点关注电子烟使用者的电子烟呼吸风险VERITAS 研究是一项全球横断面调查，旨在通过专门关注吸电子烟但从未吸烟的个体来隔离电子烟对呼吸系统健康的影响，为使用电子烟的直接后果提供独特的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Global-study-zeroes-in-on-vapings-respiratory-risks-among-exclusive-e-香烟-users.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Global-study-zeroes-in-on-vapings-respiratory-risks-among-exclusive-e-香烟-users.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6c334319-b8de-4293-98d3-2623c5ca702a Wed, 08 Nov 2023 18:17:00 -0500 Global study zeroes in on vaping's respiratory risks among exclusive e-cigarette users
麻醉药物异丙酚通过切断皮质内的通讯来取消感觉处理全身麻醉引发了一个双重谜团：它如何扰乱意识，包括感官知觉，以及这可能说明意识的本质。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Anesthetic-drug-propofol-cancels-sensory-processing-by-cutting-it-off-communication-within-the-cortex.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Anesthetic-drug-propofol-cancels-sensory-processing-by-cutting-it-off-communication-within-the-cortex.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=574bec79-b9e1-49c0-a6dd-ee7435642f5c Wed, 08 Nov 2023 14:18:00 -0500 Anesthetic drug propofol cancels sensory processing by cutting it off communication within the cortex
新的前药方法增强了药物向脑细胞的输送东芬兰大学的一项新研究表明，暂时掺入甲状腺素或甲状腺素样分子的前药可以增强药物向大脑尤其是神经胶质细胞的输送。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/New-prodrug-approach-enhances-drug-delivery-to-brain-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/New-prodrug-approach-enhances-drug-delivery-to-brain-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=256c41cb-b72c-4880-8e5d-40c30b1afe54 Wed, 08 Nov 2023 13:27:15 -0500 New prodrug approach enhances drug delivery to brain cells
温度在病毒 DNA 释放和感染中起着至关重要的作用隆德大学的研究人员与美国 NIST 同步加速器设施的同事一起，在原子水平上绘制了温度升高时病毒颗粒中发生的情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Temperature-plays-crucial-role-in-virus-DNA-release-and-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Temperature-plays-crucial-role-in-virus-DNA-release-and-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ce299202-1bec-4567-a815-90d6e055f2b1 Wed, 08 Nov 2023 13:13:16 -0500 Temperature plays crucial role in virus DNA release and infection
新药显示出治疗 ALS 的令人兴奋的前景在科学中，简单而彻底的观察可以引发最令人惊讶的发现。南卡罗来纳医科大学霍林斯癌症中心的研究人员注意到，缺乏癌症研究中感兴趣的蛋白质的小鼠随着年龄的增长，会表现出明显的运动功能异常迹象，包括失去协调性和力量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/New-drug-shows-exciting-promise-for-the-treatment-of-ALS.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/New-drug-shows-exciting-promise-for-the-treatment-of-ALS.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c0ab08f8-3d3f-46e9-8cdf-0ff05e6b7a87 Wed, 08 Nov 2023 12:58:34 -0500 New drug shows exciting promise for the treatment of ALS
哪些药物疗法可以改善酒精使用障碍患者的预后？研究人员评估了疗效并比较了各种药物治疗酒精使用障碍的相对有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Which-pharmacotherapies-are-linked-with-improved-outcomes-for-people-with-alcohol-use-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Which-pharmacotherapies-are-linked-with-improved-outcomes-for-people-with-alcohol-use-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cbf07717-bfd2-44c7-ac09-a9763847cb8a Wed, 08 Nov 2023 10:15:00 -0500 Which pharmacotherapies are associated with improved outcomes for people with alcohol use disorder?
研究人员获得资金来探索与女退伍军人大脑健康相关的因素来自诺森比亚大学和伦敦帝国理工学院的一个开创性的多学科研究团队获得了一项新颖研究的资助，该研究将探讨与女退伍军人大脑健康相关的生物、心理和社会因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Researchers-receive-funding-to-explore-factors-linked-with-brain-health-in-female-military-veterans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Researchers-receive-funding-to-explore-factors-linked-with-brain-health-in-female-military-veterans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d96d4a71-0a55-4ccd-a041-a0b96af43976 Wed, 08 Nov 2023 08:45:01 -0500 Researchers receive funding to explore factors associated with brain health in female military veterans
俄亥俄州对堕胎进行了投票。明年，另外 11 个州也可能会这样做。当活动人士分析周二俄亥俄州保护堕胎权的投票结果时，杰米·科利已经准备好明年向密苏里州选民提出类似的措施。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Ohio-voted-on-abortion-Next-year-11-more-states-might-too.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Ohio-voted-on-abortion-Next-year-11-more-states-might-too.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9ae30536-4e2c-428e-9f4d-626fe760c8f3 Wed, 08 Nov 2023 08:38:46 -0500 Ohio voted on abortion. Next year, 11 more states might, too.
与单独的 DNA 测序相比，随着时间的推移，将 RNA 测序添加到种系基因检测中能否提高准确性和临床敏感性？ DNA 和 RNA 同步测序可检测遗传性癌症的易感性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Can-adding-RNA-sequencing-to-germline-genic-testing-improve-accuracy-and-clinical-sensitivity-over-time-compared-to- DNA 测序单独.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Can-adding-RNA-sequencing-to-germline-genic-testing-improve-accuracy-and-clinical-sensitivity-over-time-compared-to- DNA 测序-alone.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5e706eba-26b0-4660-ad87-bf4848d81531 Wed, 08 Nov 2023 08:33:00 -0500 Can adding RNA sequencing to germline genetic testing improve accuracy and clinical sensitivity over time compared to DNA sequencing alone?
人工智能驱动的放射治疗彻底改变了亨利·福特西布卢姆菲尔德医院的癌症治疗在亨利·福特西布卢姆菲尔德医院接受某些类型癌症放射治疗的患者是该国首批使用尖端治疗系统的患者之一，该系统提高了准确性和精确度，提高了患者的舒适度，并最大限度地减少了副作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/AI-powered-radiation-therapy-revolutionizes-cancer-treatment-at-Henry-Ford-West-Bloomfield-Hospital.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/AI-powered-radiation-therapy-revolutionizes-cancer-treatment-at-Henry-Ford-West-Bloomfield-Hospital.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3e3e5816-6e77-43be-8483-54bcab0515db Wed, 08 Nov 2023 08:21:28 -0500 AI-powered radiation therapy revolutionizes cancer treatment at Henry Ford West Bloomfield Hospital
